full_threads.body: Hi Team, if the time was recorded in July, it will be billed for July for overages, thanks!
thank you @joel ! @victoriaV will take it from here 🙏

Hi @allieB, Yes, this can go to overage and the other would be manually charged, but Not 100% sure if they were charged last month as well. We don't want to charge twice

Thanks!
Hey @joel , I think this will be charged as long as its recorded in support hub , confirming its here 🙏 Thank you so much!
Hi @victoriaV @allieB, Can you check in chargebee? if they have been charged? Please note as well, that we have time track here of 120mins

WolfIQ Support

17 Jul 2025, 15:55 GMT+10

Hi Alyssa,

Sure, please see below:


  1. Is there a way we can get the Accessibility to the green zone?
    - We've made a slight update on the homepage box color to increase the accessibility score. Desktop score

  2. In mobile, it says that the Core Web Vitals assessment has failed https://cbo.d.pr/i/KMW7VL? What can we do to ensure this passes?
    - We've recently made updates to the site. it may take up to 28 days for Google's real-user data to reflect the changes.





Thanks,

Joel Maligalig
support@wolfiq.com.au
